profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.10 Inline image dictionaries
profile.description: The value of the F key in the Inline Image dictionary shall not be LZW, LZWDecode, Crypt, a value not listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, Table 6, or an array containing any such value.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The value of the F key in the Inline Image dictionary shall not be LZW, LZWDecode, Crypt, a value not listed in ISO 32000-1:2008, Table 6, or an array containing any such value.

error.message: Inline image uses LZW, Crypt or one of the unknown filters
